attributes.action: Force the Prime Minister to  trigger Article 50 to leave the E.U forthwith .
attributes.additional_details: Is this a democracy or not there are many who would seek to change the result and want to keep having votes until their opinion triumphs the result is in the promises have to be kept, so let the government get on with implementing the wishes of the majority of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: The people of this country made a choice that was arrived at democratically through the Referendum offered to them by the then Prime Minister David Cameron who promised to respect the outcome.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618
